ygData.subject: Re: Frustration Story (OT - Long)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... That would be the same Ogre camp that caused me to offer 50 plat for a teleport to the Karanas when I was trying to do my fastest time across the world
ygData.messageBody:
At 09:59 AM 8/23/99 -0600, you wrote:
>From: "Blair, Keith (Keith Blair)" <kblair@...>

>Trying to figure out why they attacked me I make a circle around the temple
>making sure to con everything there. Ah, there it is. Chief Dooga.
>Threateningly. How rude.

That would be the same Ogre camp that caused me to offer 50 plat for a
teleport to the Karanas when I was trying to do my "fastest time across the
world" trip.
Fortunately, a very generous spirit not only teleported me there, he
invis'd me, and walked me to my corpse, guarding me the whole way. And
then refused the payment. Wow - what a nice guy =)

The difference between my story and yours? I was bound in Kelethin, and
heading for Erudin. Death #1 = the exact same place you died, but Death #2
was in Kithicor (thanks, Capt. Shralok!). That's when I decided to ask for
a teleport.

Oh - and I was only 15th ;)

Talies the Wanderer
<The Wandering Minstrels>
Bristlebane
